snippet: CARP--Rhoda (nee Reich), passed away peacefully on Sunday at an assisted living facility in a Philadelphia suburb. Loving wife of the late Dr. Leon Carp, beloved mother and grandmother of Marc, Michael, Jeffrey and Ned and their children, and devoted sister of Seymour Reich of Manhattan and the late Lorraine Firstman, Rhoda was full of fun and life and will be missed very much. The funeral will be today in Philadelphia. Seymour D. Reich 1/3
lead_paragraph: CARP--Rhoda (nee Reich), passed away peacefully on Sunday at an assisted living facility in a Philadelphia suburb. Loving wife of the late Dr. Leon Carp, beloved mother and grandmother of Marc, Michael, Jeffrey and Ned and their children, and devoted sister of Seymour Reich of Manhattan and the late Lorraine Firstman, Rhoda was full of fun and life and will be missed very much. The funeral will be today in Philadelphia. Seymour D. Reich 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CARP, RHODA (NEE REICH)
